name: bunny
notes:
are you looking for the perfect amigurumi bunny to make for spring? this quick and easy no-sew crochet bunny pattern would make a great addition to easter baskets or your next market/craft fair as well as quick gifts for loved ones.

the pdf includes detailed instructions and photos as well as easy print pages for more advanced crocheters or for a printed hard copy.

the free written pattern can be found [here][1] on my blog.

**materials:**

* super bulky yarn
* 4.5mm crochet hook
* 8mm safety eyes
* a small amount of dk weight yarn in pink
* a small amount of 4ply yarn in black or black embroidery floss
* a small amount of worsted weight yarn
* polyester fiberfill
* stitch marker, yarn needle, scissors

the finished item measure approximately 3‚Äù (8cm) tall. item size may vary depending on tension and materials used.


  [1]: https://www.stitchbyfay.com/crochet-bunny-pattern/
